title: vENDumaDi eppOthum
sahitya:
vENDumaDi eppOdum viDudalai ammA
caraNam 1 tUNDuminba vADai vIshu tuyya tEnkaDal shuzhanra tIvilangu jyOti vAnavar
INDu namadu tOzharAgi emmODamudamuNDu kulava
nINDa magizhcci mUNDu viLaiya ninaittiDumnibam anaittum udava

   caraNam 2  viruttirAdi tAn avarkku melivdinriyE viNNU maNNum vandu paNiya mEnmai tunriyE
poruttamuradal vEdamOrndu poimmai tIra meimmai nEra
varuttamzhiya varumai ozhiya vaiya muzhudum vamai pozhiya

   caraNam 3  paNNil iniya pADalODu pAyum oLiyellAm pAril emmai purimai koNDu paTri nirkkavE
naNNIyamarar veTri kUra namadu peNgaL amarar koLLa
vaNNaminiya dEva maghaLIr maruva nAmum uvaghai tuLLa
